column3: Midian ɔsɔfo no
column5: tsee dza Nyankopɔn ayɛ ama Moses
column6: nye ne man Israel no nyinara
column7: mbrɛ EWURADZE esi eyi Israel efi Egypt."

column3: Moses n’asew no
column5: Moses yer a ɔama ɔasan kɔ no

column2: "nye ne mbabanyin beenu a ɔbaako ne dzin dze Gersom;  osiandɛ ɔkaa dɛ
column3: Mayɛ amanandze hɔho:"
column5: dzin yi gyegye dɛ kasafua ɔhɔho."

column2: "na kor no so ne dzin dze Eliezer
column3: osiandɛ ɔsee dɛ
column4: M’egya ne Nyankopɔn yɛɛ mo mboa
column5: na oyii me fii Farao n’afona anomu:"
column7: dzin no gyegye dɛ kasafua a ɔkyerɛ dɛ Nyankopɔn boa me."

column3: Moses n’asew no
column4: dze ne mbabanyin no nye ne yer no baa Moses nkyɛn wɔ sar no do mbrɛ ɔkɛkyeer nsera no

column3: Emi w’asew Jetro
column5: nye wo mbabanyin beenu no ka no ho

column3: na ɔkotowee
column4: na ɔfeew n’ano; na wobisabisaa hɔn apɔwmu; na wɔbaa asese mu."

column2: "Na Moses kaa dza osian Israel ntsi EWURADZE dze ayɛ Farao nye Egyptfo nyinara kyerɛɛ n’asew
column3: awoko a ɔbaa hɔn do wɔ ɔkwan no mu nyinara
column4: na mbrɛ EWURADZE sii yii hɔn no."

column2: "Na Jetro dzii dɛw wɔ papa a EWURADZE ayɛ ama Israel
column3: wɔ dɛ oyii hɔn fii Egyptfo nsamu no nyinara ho."
Nhyira nka EWURADZE a oeyi hom efi Egyptfo nsamu
column4: na woefi Farao nsamu; ɔno a oeyi ɔman no efi Egyptfo nsaadze."

column2: "Afei na mehu dɛ EWURADZE yɛ kɛse kyɛn enyame nyinara: nyew
column3: adze a wɔdze dzi hɔn do nkontompɔsɛm no ara mu a."
Moses n’asew no
column4: faa ɔhyew afɔr nye okum afɔr kɛmaa Nyankopɔn: na Aaron nye Israel mpanyin nyinara baa dɛ wɔnye Moses n’asew no ribedzidzi wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim."

column3: Moses tsenaa famu dɛ orubu ɔman no atsɛn: na ɔman no gyinaa Moses do tsentsen fi anapa kodur ewimbir."

column2: "Na aber a Moses n’asew hun dza ɔyɛe maa ɔman no nyinara no
column3: ɔsee dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze na ereyɛ ma ɔman yi? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na woara nko etse hɔ
column5: na ɔman no nyinara gyinagyina wo do tsentsen fi anapa ebodu ewimbir yi?"

column3: Osiandɛ ɔman no ba me nkyɛn Nyankopɔn hɔ ebisa:"
wɔba me nkyɛn; na mubu nyimpa nye ne nyɛnko ntamu atsɛn

column2: "Na Moses n’asew no see no dɛ
column3: Adze a eyɛ yi onnye."
ɔwo nye ɔman a wɔka wo ho yi nyina
column4: osiandɛ adze no yɛ dur dodow ma wo; ɔwo woara nko irunntum nnyɛ."

column3: mebɛma wo apam
column4: na Nyankopɔn ndzi w’ekyir; ɔwo gyina Nyankopɔn afamu ma ɔman no
column5: na fa nsɛm no brɛ Nyankopɔn:"

column2: "na kyerɛkyerɛ hɔn ahyɛdze no nye mbra no
column3: na ma wonhu ɔkwan kor a ɔwɔ dɛ wɔnantsew mu
column4: na edwuma a ɔwɔ dɛ wɔyɛ."

column2: "Afei so yiyi ɔman no nyinara mu mbanyin a wotum a wosuro Nyankopɔn a wɔyɛ anokwafo a wokyir enyikaber
column3: na fa hɔn sisi hɔn do
column4: ma wɔnyɛ apem apem do mpanyin

column2: "na ma wombu ɔman no ntsɛn aber nyinara mu: na ɔmbra dɛ asɛnkɛse biara dze wɔmfa mbrɛ wo
column3: na nsɛnketseaba nyinara dze
column4: hɔnara wondzi: ama aayɛ wo do har
column5: na wɔnye wo aasoa adzesoa no."

column3: na Nyankopɔn hyɛ wo dɛm a
column5: na ɔman yi nyinara so bɔkɔ hɔn tsenabew dwudwoodwo."

column3: na ɔyɛɛ dza ɔsee no nyinara."

column2: "Na Moses yiyii Israel nyinara mu nyimpa a wotum
column3: na ɔyɛɛ hɔn etsitsir wɔ ɔman no do

column2: "Na wobuu ɔman no ntsɛn aber nyinara mu: nsɛm a ɔyɛ dzen no wɔdze brɛɛ Moses
column3: na nsɛnketseaba dze hɔnara wodzii."

column2: "Na Moses gyaa n’asew no kwan; na ɔfaa no kwan kɔr nankasa n’asaase do."
